titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal building located at 600 West Madison, Chicago, Illinois, as the "Harold Washington Social Security Center".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 12/4/1987--Introduced. Designates the Federal building known as the Great Lakes Program Service Center, located at 600 West Madison, Chicago, Illinois, as the Harold Washington Social Security Center.
